reuters.title: STOLTENBERG AGREES WITH POEHL ON INFLATION OUTLOOK
reuters.body: West German Finance Minister Gerhard Stoltenberg said that there were absolutely no signs of current dangers to price stability in West Germany. He was speaking at a news conference shortly after Bundesbank president Karl Otto Poehl told a conference in Frankfurt that inflationary fears, which have been responsible for recent interest rate increases, were unjustified and exaggerated.
